name: Garlic Paprika Salmon Tail
description: This Garlic Paprika Salmon Tail recipe is a healthy indulgence for anyone following a high-protein, low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. Perfect for those looking to enjoy a sumptuous meal while keeping it nutritious.

recipeInstructions.text: Pat the salmon tail dry with paper towels to remove any excess moisture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Mix 1 tablespoon of ground black pepper, 1 teaspoon of McCormick Paprika, and 2 tablespoons of fresh lemon juice in a small bowl to create the marinade.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Rub the marinade evenly over both sides of the salmon tail.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Place the salmon tail on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
